item.title: Adding a teleport with 5 options [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

Ok, I want to make a teleport with 5 options like minigames/monsters…

But I CANT add one, I can only cahnge monster teleport to like city teleport,
but I want to ADD one, please help me :).

break;
case 59136: << That’s the case, but what case I must ADD to make me own?
if(c.interfaceGame == 1)
c.triggerTele(3213, 3425, 0);
if(c.interfaceGame == 2)
c.triggerTele(3564, 3288, 0);

[font=Verdana]-------------------------[/font]
case 73148:
case 4146:
c.sendQuest(“Varrock”, 15240);
c.sendQuest(“Falador”, 15241);
c.sendQuest(“Lumbridge”, 15239);
c.sendQuest(“Catherby”, 15243);
c.sendQuest(“Ardougne”, 15242);
c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855)
c.interfaceGame = 1;
break;

DeltaScape base, 317.
